context: Zebra Technologies Corporation is a enterprise asset tracking company focused on barcode printers, RFID, mobile computers, and software. COVID supply chain drove demand.

competitors.name: Honeywell International
competitors.notes: Next biggest competitor across all three markets (printers, barcodes, mobile computers); has low-double digit market share

competitors.name: Datalogic
competitors.notes: Significant competitor in automatic data capture and industrial automation

competitors.name: Sato Holdings
competitors.notes: Competitor in barcode printing and RFID technology
